docs.lead_paragraph: The more interesting political divide may be between President Obama and the growing ranks of Republican governors who will help decide the fate of many of his policies.

headline.seo: G.O.P. Governors Ready to the Hold Line On Obama Policies
headline.main: G.O.P. Governors Ready to Hold Line on Obama Policies
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Governors Ready to Hold Line On Obama Policies

docs.abstract: News analysis; more interesting political divide than just Democratic president battling with Republican house may be between Pres Obama and growing ranks of Republican governors who will help decide fate of many of his policies; several make clear at Republican Governors Association meeting in Las Vegas that they will sometimes try to check Obama's powers.
docs.snippet: The more interesting political divide may be between President Obama and the growing ranks of Republican governors who will help decide the fate of many of his policies.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: A woman was reportedly denied a potentially lifesaving abortion while she was having a miscarriage.

headline.main: Hospital Death in Ireland Renews Fight Over Abortion
headline.print_headline: Hospital Death In Ireland Renews Fight Over Abortion

docs.abstract: Death of Savita Halappanavar, who was reportedly denied potentially lifesaving abortion even while she was having miscarriage, revives debate over Ireland's almost total ban on abortions; Irish Supreme Court ruled in 1992 that abortion is permissible in certain cases, but Irish government has yet to pass a law to this effect.
docs.snippet: A woman was reportedly denied a potentially lifesaving abortion while she was having a miscarriage.
